title: The Fastest Bikepackers in the Pyrenees
content:
Safa Brian takes us along his Tour to The Tour series with a ripping, fully-loaded descent in the Pyrenees. Just because he and his crew are touring doesn’t mean they don’t get sendy on the descents.

1st descent is Col Col de Mente | 2nd descent is Col de Portet d’Aspet | 3rd descent is Cole de la Core 

The post The Fastest Bikepackers in the Pyrenees appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
